column5: Hi Everyone, I always want to go to lake Simcoe for some small mouth bass fishing, because I have seen so many 4LB+ smallies from there all over the web. I do not have a boat and I don't know where to find those smallies. So I am wondering if anyone can provide any local guide information. Plus what is the best time to go Lake Simcoe for smallies? Thanks
Send Mark Kulik a pm.  If you want to catch big smallies on Simcoe he is your man.
you cannot possibly do better than Greg Klatt, ping Slayingm from one of the prior posts.  He is your man.
Is this Kevin Van Dam looking for a guide?  How are the sexy shad patterns working this year?  Coffee tubes working well?
AHHH HAHAHAHA.  Have a lolly pop...
